Burnaby: Transit development impacting real estate investment timing

Richmond: Foreign investment effects on local retirement planning

Travel Times to Our Greater Vancouver Offices

From Surrey BC Areas

Cloverdale → Downtown Office 35-45 minutes
Newton → Surrey Satellite 15-20 minutes

Employer-Specific Financial Planning

We specialize in pension optimization, group RRSP maximization, and executive compensation planning for employees of Greater Vancouver's major employers.

Public Sector: PSPP, MSP, Teacher Pensions

Healthcare: HEABC benefits optimization

Education: Faculty pension planning

Tech/Private: Stock option strategies

Seasonal Financial Planning for Greater Vancouver

Weather-Related Financial Considerations

Flood Risk Areas (Surrey, Richmond, Delta): Flood insurance and emergency fund planning

Earthquake Preparedness: Disaster emergency funds and business continuity planning

Snow Events (North Shore, Coquitlam): Winter accessibility and heating cost planning

Wildfire Smoke (Summer): Health insurance and air quality equipment planning

Seasonal Financial Activities

Tax Season (Feb-Apr): RRSP contributions and tax optimization

Summer (Jun-Aug): Family vacation budgeting and travel insurance

Fall (Sep-Nov): Investment portfolio rebalancing

Year-End (Dec): Tax-loss harvesting and charitable giving

WestGroup Financial - Your Trusted Vancouver Financial Advisors
WestGroup Financial Management Inc. is a registered investment advisor licensed in British Columbia. Securities offered through licensed representatives. Investment advisory services provided as a fiduciary. Past performance does not guarantee future results. All investments involve risk including potential loss of principal.

Serving: Vancouver, Surrey, Burnaby, Richmond, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Coquitlam, Langley, Delta, New Westminster, and all of Metro Vancouver and Fraser Valley.
